item.title: Eve-Swagger v0.2 released
item.description: I just released Eve-Swagger v0.2 on PyPI. Eve-Swagger is a Swagger/OpenAPI extension for Eve powered RESTful APIs. This maintenance release addresses a few issues and adds support for eve-auth-jwt. Many thanks to Roberto Romero for his contributions to this release. Subscribe to the newsletter, the RSS feed, or follow @nicolaiarocci on Twitter
